title: Cinefantastique Vol 08 No 2-3 (Spring 1979)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Features an extensive look at the making of the sci-fi classic Forbidden Planet. Also includes interviews with Gene Roddenberry (Star Trek: The Motion Picture), Michael Lonsdale (Moonraker), Martin Rosen (Watership Down), Bob Clark (Murder by Decree), articles on Timewarp, Quartermass, movie reviews, news and more.
